name: Audiosear.ch
description: At Audiosear.ch, were building the webs most comprehensive source of data about podcasts and radio. We transform sound into information and synthesize thousands of data points from around the web to generate intelligence for spoken word audio. Audiosear.chs smart audio recommendations can be broken down by show, network, category, topic, and more. The result: a smart engine for audio stories to power search and recommendation for your app.
